tweet: After a 3hr dinner meeting, Oregon State Athletic Training department is now on board to test our application.
Working on adding more exercises to our database for you all to utilize in workout and program creation.  We will have 100 ready here soon.
We just finished a review meeting for the public site.  Things are looking good for a public site release mid to late this week.
Interested in how Elevation applies the Pareto Principle to the Fitness Industry http://bit.ly/p4bGn
I just want to congratulate Dave Schwendiman for having his second child and also uploading over 30 exercises into the database this week.
